bibl.title: The Archaeology of Jordan and Beyond. Essays in Honor of James A. Sauer
bibl.note: HAWASS Zahi, Roman Mummies Discovered at Bahria Oasis.

Lawrence E. STAGER, Joseph A. GREENE and Michael D. COOGAN (Edd.), The Archaeology of Jordan and Beyond. Essays in Honor of James A. Sauer = Harvard Semitic Museum Publications. Studies in the Archaeology and History of the Levant. 1 (Winona Lake, Indiana, 2000) pp. 157-166, 13 figg.
